header_text: After coming home from running errands, you can't find your wallet. Recently, you have struggled to control your emotions and become angry at the thought of someone stealing it. Later, you find the wallet in the car and feel annoyed.

elements.Text: Are you using tools that will help you cope when you're annoyed?
